sentences.english: Foot of the mountain there is a clear bottoming out of the creek, streams next to the terraces.
sentences.chinese: 山脚下有一条清澈见底的小溪，小溪旁边是梯田。

sentences.english: The soil nutrient vertical variation feature was significant in Yuanyang terraced field.
sentences.chinese: 云阳梯田土壤养分垂直变异特征明显。

sentences.english: We had to fill up each mu of terraced fields with thousands of basketfuls of good soil.
sentences.chinese: 每亩梯田我们得填上成千上万筐好土。

sentences.english: And the soil loss of the grading terrace is more serious than the paddy field, with lower hypsography .
sentences.chinese: 地势较高的缓坡梯田比地势低的水稻田侵蚀严重。

sentences.english: The terraces create an artificial landscape perfectly suited to a par 3.
sentences.chinese: 梯田创造的人工风景和三杆洞相得益彰。

sentences.english: You may have to terrace your land or build raised beds.
sentences.chinese: 你可能需要把地弄成梯田状，或是垫高。

sentences.english: Boxed and terraced planters retain more root moister and nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 盒装和梯田种植留住更多的根潮湿和养分。

sentences.english: Yuanyang, a Hani minority settlement with vast rice- terraces .
sentences.chinese: 元阳县，哈尼族居住区，有大片稻谷梯田。

sentences.english: When visiting in countryside nearby Fuping, I saw collieries and mountains with embankments.
sentences.chinese: 观富平附近的农村时，我看到了煤矿和梯田式的大山。

sentences.english: The Longsheng rice terraces are a popular destination for many visitors in Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 龙胜梯田受到许多到桂林地区旅游者欢迎的游览景点。

sentences.english: The effect of terraced fields is notable and the effect of growing grasses on the walls of terrace is much better.
sentences.chinese: 梯田的减流减沙效果明显，梯壁植草效果更好。

sentences.english: Mountain terraces, moved, farmers uncle opened smiling face.
sentences.chinese: 山间的梯田里，麦浪滚滚，农民伯伯绽开了笑脸。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a terrace type column-shaped cultivation device.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型属梯田式柱型栽培器。

sentences.english: Yunnan, China, is a beautiful place for shooting rice field terraces.
sentences.chinese: 中国云南是个美丽的地方，可以拍到很多梯田。

sentences.english: The relationship between benefit and parameters is negative correlation. Also terrace quality effects the benefits.
sentences.chinese: 同时，梯田的质量也影响蓄水保土效益。

sentences.english: To ensure that the rice terraces of water-based civilization from generation to generation.
sentences.chinese: 保证了梯田稻作文明世代相传的水源基础。

definition: karst landform (weathered limestone, often forming caves)
the peaks of a mountain range
in picturesque disorder (idiom); irregular arrangement with charming effect
